documents.document: What the fuck is synergy anyways? But twitter get your shit together. Or not. That way i don't end up broke.
@emma_swervin dougal did a dance so I guess so? I was reading and having tea so I was elsewhere.
Okay twitter adds are weird... I am getting fertility adds (stop.it.) and synergy ones. What. The. Fuck.
Watching two guys play fifa as I sip tea. I feel like I am observing some weird ritual. Hell one asked me to applaud a goal.
Is there a reboot button? Restore factory settings? https://t.co/qSfKBYd6GE
They fit him better than me. #housemateshenanigans https://t.co/uMBhU1Tfiu
Thank you. This is wonderful. Beautifully written. #repealthe8th https://t.co/aQCDfoDdT5
Someone asked me about an unplanned pregancy and I joked about travelling. That is all it should be. A joke. #repealthe8th
@drg1985 nice! One of my housemates was very confused on opening the cupboard. (He's new)
I fucking love this book. (Yes I hated Romeo and Juliet. Still do.) https://t.co/DDh0KzrVAK
@aoifemrtn nessa carey. It is SO interesting! Highly recommend. And i am only on chapter three!
@aoifemrtn oh thanks! I am currently taking a break from that for The epigenetics revolution. So fascinating.
@aoifemrtn I am proud of that. You can get your very own UNT mug from firebox. Hehe
*childish giggle* https://t.co/uCwIMSnQfA
@Irishsmurf i may need to borrow that small book of yours... https://t.co/FqkQPcxbOt
My 28th will be a good birthday. Will be enjoying the heck out of #HamiltonLDN booyah! https://t.co/EekrZPj08f
@Irishsmurf i bought two for my birthday... i am weak.
@Irishsmurf yeah well i have cursed child this year so i am not as bothered. Enjoy though!
@Irishsmurf i could have gotten some for 200 pounds but eeeeeh no
Truth. Being uninformed must be so relaxing. I am just a cauldron of fear and rage right now. https://t.co/ydMvv1y5rd
This is awesome. I love it so much. https://t.co/ovvB7d4JcR
Not a leader. Not my bloody taoiseach. https://t.co/XEzRlUTM51

Someday I will have these WITH me when I buy books. Someday. https://t.co/YBRFy4gB8a
@emma_swervin anyone irish who bitches about immigrants can fuck right off as far as I'm concerned.
@emma_swervin my favourite ed byrne joke "we have been populating the globe since we figured out how to get into a boat"
@sophswhynot heck I was looking up masters in it. And I ain't ready for that. But argh. https://t.co/MoLXlKBnkv
To distract myself from the shitshow outside I have immersed myself in science. Reading science listening to it... I love it so!
@emma_swervin accurate. But I do want to take that violin and start swinging...
@emma_swervin first we must out Kenny. Cause he is a wimp focused only on not rocking the boat. THERE'S A MASSIVE LEAK YOU PRICK
This is why i was avoiding twitter today. The world has actually made TINDER seem like a better option. https://t.co/MKYVuGUKzu
Disappointed but not surprised. Damn you Kenny.
Unless he plans to punch him in the face... it really isn't. Have a backbone and LEAD for once. It's your JOB after… https://t.co/OdwIvXfPSP
I love this guy. *sniffles* https://t.co/iDrL6KaJuj
@sophswhynot with a careful eye on the leaders of this country.
So yeah when I saw "stick it to the Man." I mean it. I will be sticking to the Man. And anyone who stands by him.
@sophswhynot and it isn't hyperbole. It is legitimate concern for the state of our world.
Can't believe I live in a time where everyone I am friends with is just turning to one another and saying "revolution?" "Yeah"

2016 was the mini boss. 2017 is the.big battle.
2018 you had better not be the sneaky "actual" final boss. I am wa… https://t.co/ti55y0zU3t
@doctorsqueaks make it a double.
Another day another shittier injustice. Why do I never have emergency alcohol??? A rookie mistake
@emma_swervin still horrible though https://t.co/YlS06XD1wb
@emma_swervin I just looked at the signs disgusted. This time so bloody stillbirths so they are getting better
Anti-choice by the gpo. Why do I ONLY have my badges on!?? Ah well best I avoid them.
@emma_swervin "stupid and dangerous feminist propaganda" someone pass me a bucket.
Only 50% of adult male sheep are straight. Podcasts may ruin me for normal conversation. "HERE ARE MY FAV FACTS FROM THIS WEEK. OOOOOO"
@doctorsqueaks firebox. Got mine on sale but you should so buy it... here https://t.co/iiAqsUUr6d it is AMAZING. Will be christening soon.
@WhitestNoise i just need a science one to complete the set.
@WhitestNoise I feel the really capture a lot of my personality. The nerdy dork side and the SMASH THE PATRIARCHY side.

I hear some people get cRaZy on Friday nights. I just flipped my mattress.
This. Is. Living. #flop
Also just saw Drumpfs tweets about vaccinations. SO MUCH NO.

Enda Kenny was just a recommended account for me to follow.
No. No. NO NO NO NO NO. https://t.co/fSxOv2MFIW
Vadar's March is just BLARING in my head constantly. Argh.
Why must we gender glasses?? I think i could pull off these quite nicely! Stop gendering this shit. https://t.co/TA5yidOcCA

And I still need more mugs. But these are awesome. https://t.co/sI6l30dT7g
I am right there with you. Also blame online dating. Tinder is destroying us. And we know it. https://t.co/IBirVLFoGs
@sorobotic aka I DO NOT UNDERSTAND THIS DATING THING. Some lads have issues with my loud liberal dorkiness. Looooosers.
@sorobotic someone gave me the eye yesterday on the bus. I tripped out in surprise. Online dating makes things tricky.
@sorobotic oh god I feel so old now... and I am going to use this phrase UNIRONICALLY. Kids these days...
I spent a good five minutes ranting about "motherfucking folates" my job is weird.
Today when I seem to be at my clumsiest is not the day for tomato soup... when I am wearing my sole white shirt. Oh no. #ohnooo
@WhitestNoise is this a joke? Please say yes otherwise my head may explode.
@GalwayForLife @CoraSherlock "empower" women by restricting their options?? How does that make any sense??
@sorobotic so good!! His articles are brilliant. I wish I could write like that!... I hear practice helps...
My ideal date. Ha https://t.co/JZ628vcvp4
@sorobotic there really isn't. But I have to finish Ben Goldacre's "I think you'll find it's more complicated than that." So much science...
It is ridiculous how excited I am to read a book about epigenetics. #nerdporn #talksciencetome https://t.co/UjcO6G2hrh
@EmmaMurphy12150 we have had this chat Emma. The Nazis banned abortion. Please stop using inflammatory information.
Just realised that me sitting here with three books, the dorkiest bag ever and having plans for this evening is all 16 year old me wanted.
Oh god facebook is at this story business too. No. Damn social media.
True. And yet... *swipe* *swipe* https://t.co/i8ut4bbiFo

Uuuuh YES. Finally some good news! https://t.co/l9reqFiYvu
Now I am getting fertility treatment adds??? Twitter STOP THAT RIGHT NOW. I am happy with an empty uterus. Very much so.
@sophswhynot he is dancing now. I really do not get this.
My housemate is yelling at fifa 2017... I really don't get soccer or games about it. So much confusion.

@Irishsmurf thank you! I was just hitting subscribe! Ha
Anyone got any recommendations for science podcasts? Kinda feeling the need. So much need

Thanks to @SexSiopa and @sorobotic talking about badass irish ladies I feel cheated by my irish education. Not for the first time mind you.
@emma_swervin putting it mildly. I do love how his own son subtweeted him.
@piersmorgan can we do ANYTHING right Piers?
